CustomField.formula: Final_Price_for_North_East__c + Final_Other_Corners__c + Final_East__c + Final_100_Ft_Road_Plots__c + Final_Preimum_Plots__c + Legal_And_Documentation_Charges__c + Registration_Charges__c + Corpus_Fund_and_Club_House_Payable__c + (Corpus_Fund_and_Club_House_Payable__c * 18/100)
CustomField.label: Total Additional Charges
